opinion:
GASKI REALTY, INC. v. GASKI, 44 Conn. App. 932 (1997) 692 A.2d 869 GASKI REALTY, INC. v. ADAM GASKI (16054)Appellate Court of Connecticut
Dupont, C.J., and Landau and Schaller, Js.
Submitted on briefs March 24, 1997
Officially released April 22, 1997
Appeal from the Superior Court in the judicial district of Hartford-New Britain at New Britain, Fineberg, J.
Per Curiam.
The judgment is affirmed.
